general.gigTitle: design and develop a modern wordpress website for you

sellerCard.oneLiner: I am hard working driven and fearless
sellerCard.description: Hello, I'm Sumaiya Arif. With five years of web development experience, I've established a reputation for delivering exceptional service and high-quality work, earning good ratings from diverse clients, from small businesses to large organizations. I take the time to understand each client's unique needs, consistently meeting and exceeding expectations. My goal is 100% client satisfaction, and I'm committed to building long-term partnerships. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SEO, SMM, and PPC.

description.content:
Are you in need of a new website or a redesign? Look no further! I offer professional, eye-catching, fully responsive, and customized WordPress designs tailored to your specific needs. With over 5 years of experience and 500+ completed projects, I cater to any website and industry, from simple blogs to complex e-commerce sites.


Why choose me?

  • 5+ years of experience
  • Unlimited revisions
  • Quick turnaround
  • 24/7 support
  • Fast understanding of your requirements
  • Free maintenance for a month


What I offer:

  • Responsive design
  • User-friendly back-end panel with drag-and-drop functionality
  • Multilingual store support
  • High-quality images
  • Newsletter signup
  • Contact form integration
  • WooCommerce setup
  • Theme customization
  • Animations
  • Google Maps integration
  • Speed optimization
  • Subscription popup
  • Multi-currency support
  • Live chat
  • Social media integration
  • Stunning sliders
  • Various payment gateway integration
  • SEO optimization
  • Website optimization for all devices
  • Bug fixing
  • Migration
  • Hosting setup
  • Security
  • Email setup
  • and much more

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting and domain registration services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can assist with setting up hosting and domain registration, but the actual purchase of hosting and domain services will need to be done by you. I can recommend reliable hosting providers if needed.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What information do you need from me to start the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To start, I need your website content, logo, branding guidelines, design preferences, and business details. Also, provide your WordPress login or domain and hosting info. If you don't have hosting, I can set it up on my hosting and migrate your site later.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long will it take to complete my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The delivery time depends on the package you choose. The Basic package takes 2 days, the Standard package takes 3 days, and the Premium package takes 7 days. However, the timeline may vary based on the complexity of the project and your specific requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to manage and update the content in future?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, You will easily be able to manage and update the content of your website in the future. Not only that, I make free video tutorials to teach you how you can easily manage your website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you be available if I need any help with the website in the future?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I am available 24/7 to provide assistance and support even after the website is completed. I believe in building long-term relationships with my clients.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you manage my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer monthly website management services for a fixed fee.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you clone or replicate a website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can replicate any website of your choice, customizing it with your colors, content, and branding.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer SEO services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I include basic SEO optimization in all packages to help improve your websites visibility on search engines. For advanced SEO services, please contact me for a custom offer.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I need additional features not listed in your packages?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If you need additional features or custom functionality, please contact me before placing an order. We can discuss your requirements and create a custom offer tailored to your needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer API integration services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do. I can integrate various APIs to enhance the functionality of your website.

packageList.title: Basic
packageList.description: 2-page website including a landing page and contact/quote form

packageList.title: Standard
packageList.description: 5-page website including a blog page, fully responsive design, and payment processing

packageList.title: Premium
packageList.description: 10-page website with advanced security, speed optimization, and additional features

reviews.comment: Sumalya is a great person. I am impressed of the website she created for me. She understood immediately what I wanted from her, was always available and very patient with me. Besides the beautiful homepage she made for me, she was always kind. The homepage is better than I ever expected. Thank you so much Sumalya. I will definitely book you again for further projects :)

Sumaiya built our website, and is mow providing excellent support in adding new functionalities and solving minor issues due to updates of libraries and plugins. Sumaiya is super responsive, knowledgeable, comes with the right solutions in short time and is pro-active in signaling further improvements. Highly recommend working with her!

The seller is an exceptional human being. She is thoughtful and experienced. She communicates nonstop, which is great! I don't know when she sleeps because she seems to be working at all times. She delivered a great website that meets our needs. Very clean design. She was patient with all of my requests for edits.

hello , Sumaiya is hands down the best developer on Fiverr! She is highly skilled, professional, and incredibly cooperative. Her commitment to delivering top-quality work is unmatched. If you're looking for a developer who understands your requirements, communicates effectively, and delivers beyond expectations, close your eyes and hire her!

Sumaiya Arif delivered an exemplary performance in website development, showcasing impeccable attention to detail and professionalism that EXCEEDED expectations. Her deep understanding and cooperative nature truly made the collaboration smooth and efficient, always keeping me informed and completing tasks swiftly.  I was impressed with her helpfulness and communication throughoutI'll definitely be hiring her again!
